FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for an LNS group.
The undo description command deletes the description of an LNS group.
By default, no description is configured for an LNS group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of an LNS group.
The value is string of 1 to 80 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-lns-group-backgroup] description this is a backup group
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After running the lns-group command to create an LNS group, you can run the description command to configure a description for the LNS group to facilitate later query.
The display lns-group command displays the description of an LNS group.
Configuration Impact
If the description command is run more than once, the latest configuration overrides the previous one.
